description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.
name: mobx-react

scripts.build: node build-rollup.js && cp src/index.d.ts index.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts custom.d.ts
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run jest && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:jest: npm run build && npm run jest
scripts.test:travis: npm run build && npm run jest && npm run test:ts
